pages.text: Dark, flaming cages of strange metal which spew forth a torrent of endless monsters. These are $(item)spawners$(), and their existence has not been questioned often. Like many things in the world, they simply are; a fact of life, as it were. Yet, I always find myself wondering: what are they shaped from? What powers them?

In an effort to understand how these mysterious constructs work, I discovered that when breaking them, one is left with a powerless, ruined device. A practice I discovered later, known as $(thing)soul engulfing$(), can aid in the restoration and revitalization of this construct.

So doing, I have discovered - or, perhaps, rediscovered - an art which harnesses the energies of souls to summon creatures, conjure items and experience, and more. Here I catalogue my findings, in hopes that the curious reader would be able to tap into these powers with certainty about their use.
